DataElement.preferredDefinition: Identification of a lesion as either target or non-target.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The identification of a lesion that is present at baseline, is measurable and is the primary target of the therapeutic intervention._The identification of a lesion that is not considered a target lesion but may be affected by the therapeutic intervention._A method of generalization, the systematic arrangement of entities into classes or groups based on mutual similarity and certain differing characteristics.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Target Lesion Identification Non-Target Lesion Identification
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The identification of a lesion that is present at baseline, is measurable and is the primary target of the therapeutic intervention.:The identification of a lesion that is not considered a target lesion but may be affected by the therapeutic intervention.

Concepts.definition: The identification of a lesion that is present at baseline, is measurable and is the primary target of the therapeutic intervention.
The identification of a lesion that is not considered a target lesion but may be affected by the therapeutic intervention.

Property.preferredDefinition: Classification; the grouping of things into classes or categories.

Concepts.definition: A method of generalization, the systematic arrangement of entities into classes or groups based on mutual similarity and certain differing characteristics.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: RECISTv1.1:Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors v1.1
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/31/17 tt transferred context, added registration status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 6/19/16 released. jk 9/1/15 created for RECISTv1.1 module. jk

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The identification of a lesion as measurable or non-measurable based on some commonality or user defined characteristics.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The identification of a lesion that is present at baseline, is measurable and is the primary target of the therapeutic intervention.

Concepts.definition: The identification of a lesion that is present at baseline, is measurable and is the primary target of the therapeutic intervention.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The identification of a lesion that is not considered a target lesion but may be affected by the therapeutic intervention.

Concepts.definition: The identification of a lesion that is not considered a target lesion but may be affected by the therapeutic intervention.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueDomain.origin: RECISTv1.1:Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors v1.1
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/31/17 tt transferred context, added registration status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 6/19/16 removed qualifier concepts per current BP; released. jk 9/1/15 created for RECISTv1.1 CRF module final review. jk

DataElement.origin: RECISTv1.1:Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors v1.1
DataElement.changeDescription: 10/21/18 jk removed from NCI Standards RECISTv1.1 CSI per RECIST FG recommendation to use CDEs 58514 and 58515; changed to "Application" registration status. 8/5/18 jk remove iRECIST CSI; use CDE 4472278 or 4472279 as trigger question. 8/31/17 tt transferred context, changed registration status per Round 5 finalization task. 6/19/16 released. jk 9/1/15 createdfor RECISTv1.1 module final review. jk
